participant_1.background:
I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book.
anyways i decided to give it a try and participaed in an audition for a talent show.
I use makeup to help me feel more confident and powerful, even when my back is hurting.
i do not like broccoli.
I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances.

participant_2.background:
I like musicians who are open about their sexuality and gender identity, because it gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
i live in alabama.
I would not be able to be a pharmacist if I were blind because I would not be able to read the labels on the medication bottles.
i wear a red purse.

content.text: Hey, I am from Alabama too! What part are you from?
I am from Birmingham, but I live in a small town about 30 minutes away now.
Oh cool, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks with my dog, explore new places, and listen to music.
Me too! I love going for walks with my dog, especially when the weather is nice. I also like to go to concerts and listen to music.
I love concerts too! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I really like music by artists who are open about their sexuality and gender identity. It gives me hope that I can be myself one day.
That's great! I like music that makes me feel good, regardless of the artist's sexuality or gender identity.
I agree! Music is a great way to express yourself and connect with others.
It is! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone new who shares your interests.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
